Based on the user's preference cues, I would recommend "The Wrestler" as a potential recommendation.
"The Wrestler" is a 2008 American biographical sports drama film directed by Guy Ritchie and written by Guy Ritchie. The film stars Ajay Naidu, Ajay Naidu, John D'Leo, Evan Rachel Wood, Mickey Rourke, Marisa Tomei, Mark Margolis, Mark Margolis.
"The Wrestler" is a well-received film that received several awards, including five Academy Awards nominations and the Palme d'Or at the 54th Venice International Film Festival in 2008. The film tells the story of Frank Bass (Rourke), an ex-wrestling champion who has struggled to find purpose after his career ended. Frank' s life takes a dramatic turn when he is hired by a wealthy businessman, Mr. Zane (Tom Wilkinson)), to train a new wrestling champion named Jake Ryan (Mickey Rourke)). Frank' s training of Jake Ryan becomes increasingly intense and dangerous as Frank tries to push Jake Ryan to become the best wrestling champion in the world.
